entities.name: him
entities.description: The subject of the sentence, introduced as the one performing an action. ("almost immediately, pulling from underneath HIM...")

entities.name: moulting
entities.description: An object being described as shedding its skin or feathers. ("a moulting...")

relationships.description: The subject of the sentence is in possession of or interacting with the object. ("pulling from underneath HIM a moulting...")
